snippet: The new law is off to a good start, with most of those who signed up reporting that they are pleased.
abstract: Editorial contends national survey published by Commonwealth Fund offers encouraging reviews from people across country who signed up for private plans or Medicaid during first enrollment period of Affordable Care Act; maintains reform effort is off to good start, particularly in states determined to take full advantage of the law.
lead_paragraph: The new law is off to a good start, with most of those who signed up reporting that they are pleased.

headline.main: Early Returns on Health Care Reform
headline.print_headline: Early Returns on Health Care Reform

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
